Title: Provides public health insurance coverage for children who are eligible for such coverage under the age of six to continue until they reach the age of six
Summary: Provides public health insurance coverage for children who are eligible for such coverage under the age of six to continue until they reach the age of six.
LawCode: Amd ยง366, Soc Serv L; amd ยง2511, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law and the public health law, in relation to ensuring continuity of public health insurance coverage to children under six years of age
